label: Intermediate Studio II
description: Continuation of ARTS 350. Combined painting, sculpture and new media. Self-directed arts practice. Individual and group critique; includes seminars, discussions, demonstrations, visiting artists and critics, and field trips. Interaction and collaboration among students in painting, sculpture and new media. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Prerequisite: ARTS 350.  For Art majors only.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Prerequisite: ARTS 350.  For Art majors only.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Painting or Sculpture major(s).
classScheduleInformation: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, will be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term. The studio is reserved at all times for intermediate painting students.
